name: If You Score, You Have To Hug Grandma. Those Are The Rules.
description: I was in the front row at a Roma vs Cagliari match in Rome in 2014. Then Roma player Alessandro Florenzi celebrated his goal against Cagliari by running into the stands to share the moment with his grandmother. “She is 82 and had never been to the stadium before,” Florenzi told Sky Sport Italia. "This goal is for her. After I played for Italy, she told me that she’d come to the stadium and I would score. My family gave me this passion for football, I want to share my joy with everyone.” It was a truly memorable moment, and I happened to have my camera in hand.
